title: Democrats Only Care About Racism When They Aren't Doing It | 6/18/21
description:
Nancy Pelosi was asked a question about abortion, and she refused to answer whether the baby is human. There are still bitcoins available to mine; will you become a Bitcoin millionaire? A California district cut its COVID death count by 25% by revisiting some of the cases. Masterpiece Cakeshop owner Jack Phillips is back in the news again after being sued for not making a cake celebrating a transsexual. A video resurfaced of a woman calling for Dr. Fauci's retirement, back in 2003. Artist Eric Clapton spoke about his negative experience with the COVID vaccine, and he believes he lost friendships because of it. Hunter Biden is going through yet another racist text scandal. The liberal privilege in the media has never been more apparent.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
